title: Oh joy. I got DC'd by riot and am now getting a login error.
body: I hope i dont get penalized - it happened in the first few minutes of a game... And i cant log back to resume the game.

replies.body: "The game is temporarily unavailable while we perform scheduled maintenance, we expect this maintenance to be complete by 06:00."

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=b1uGs66a,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2020-02-05T11:36:09.502+0000)
>
> "The game is temporarily unavailable while we perform scheduled maintenance, we expect this maintenance to be complete by 06:00."

If that were the case, shouldnt queues have been shut down or a warning given? Also isnt patch day thursday morning, not Wednesday?

> [{quoted}](name=Paroe,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=b1uGs66a,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2020-02-05T11:42:26.361+0000)
>
> If that were the case, shouldnt queues have been shut down or a warning given? Also isnt patch day thursday morning, not Wednesday?

It says in the client. Ranked queues disabled in preparation for the patch, etc. and so forth.
Either you or someone on your team was in a promotional match, and the disconnect+lock out dice roll landed on you.
